column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Warden says : " Are you comfortable , Chit Sang ? "
#Text=Chit Sang says : " If you 're trying to get me to talk , forget it !
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " Well , yeah , actually I am pretty comfortable .
#Text=" Warden says : " Are you still comfortable ?
#Text=" Chit Sang says : " No .
#Text=" Warden says : " I know you and your cronies are not smart enough to come up with that little escape plan .
#Text=So you 're gon na tell me ... who is ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " So where 's Bato ?
#Text=Where 's everyone else from the invasion ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " The others are being held at a prison near the Fire Nation palace .
#Text=They singled me out as their leader and sent me here .
#Text=But before I left , I met some young women who said they knew you .
#Text=The ... Oshinama Fighters ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You mean the Kyoshi Warriors ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " That 's right .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Their leader Suki is here and she 's gon na escape with us .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Good .
#Text=We 'll need all the help we can get .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And you know Prince Zuko ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " The son of the Fire Lord ?
#Text=I do n't know him , but I know of him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , he 's here too .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sounds like a major problem .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Actually , he 's on our side now .
#Text=I know .
#Text=I had the same reaction .
#Text=After all he 's done , it was hard to trust him .
#Text=But he 's really proven himself , and I never would 've found you without his help .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " So , do you have a plan ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " We had one , but some of the other prisoners got involved and ruined it .
#Text=I du n no if there 's another way off this island .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sokka , there 's no prison in the world that can hold two Water Tribe geniuses .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Then we 'd better find two .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko , are you there ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I just got done talking to my dad .
#Text=We came up with an escape plan together .
#Text=" Male guard says : " What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I was just telling this dirty lowlife what I think of him !
#Text=" Male guard says : " Well , you 'll have to do that later .
#Text=He 's coming with us .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why ?
#Text=" Female guard says : " Because we have orders straight from the warden , that 's why !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Could I just get ten more seconds to rough him up a bit ?
#Text=" Female guard says : " Fine , ten seconds .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Take that ... and this !
#Text=" Male guard says : " Newbie .
#Text="
